para.text: An unincorporated nonprofit association shall have the capacity to sue and be sued in its own name.
A member or a manager may assert a claim the member or manager has against an unincorporated nonprofit association. An association may assert a claim it has against a member or a manager.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 9 of the Uniform Unincorporated Nonprofit Association Act (2008 Act).
